methods.name: SetUpInventoryFilters
methods.comment: This function sets the filters on the input output inventories.

methods.name: Factory_ConsumeIngredients
methods.comment:
This can differ between buildings (eg. Converters), so override if you need something special.
@note this function assumes the available ingredients are there and have been checked with CanProduce()

methods.name: SetManufacturingSpeed
methods.comment: The player can increase the manufacturing speed in the UI "minigame"

properties.name: mInputInventorySize
properties.comment: Size of the input inventory for the workbench
